description: This Java class named DataLoader is part of a Spring Boot application. It is configured to run on application startup to load some sample Event data into an H2 in-memory database. The class defines a bean that creates an initialization routine, adding two Event instances if the database is initially empty.

classes.name: DataLoader
classes.description: Spring configuration class responsible for populating initial Event data into the database when the application starts.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Defines a CommandLineRunner bean that inserts initial Event entries into the repository if it is empty.
